subject: Colleges and Universities
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Daryl Gross resigned as athletic director, and Boeheim, the men’s basketball coach, is expected to retire after the 2017-18 season, the university said, in the wake of academic misconduct.
snippet: Daryl Gross resigned as athletic director, and Boeheim, the men’s basketball coach, is expected to retire after the 2017-18 season, the university said, in the wake of academic misconduct.
